title: [Indie Rock] Twombly - Rare Candies Are Made With Dreams EP. (20
description:
Twombly

Rare Candies Are Made With Dreams

-------------------------------------------------------

Infos on the band

In the beginning, Max would like to know if Hubert and ClÃƒÂ©ment was up for a beer. Those guys was ready to get down, Max was heading up to the fridge. But in his way, a strange guy give'em music instruments and told us they had to play music. It was sad because they just wanted to get drunk. As they needed a last member who could provide alcohol easily and quickly, their choice naturally has been oriented on Britain and Dimitri joined the project. So was born Twombly

Today, Twombly is an indie rock band who always needs to go further. It could be with dirty garage rock tones or electro bizarre sounds. The four dudes try everything, the most important is to never have an empty glass.

September 1st 2015, Twombly release its first EP "Rare Candies Are Made With Dreams", a kind of pot pourri who defines childhood, youth, through the eyes of grown up adults who just wanna have fun. By taking the road here and there, the four guys hope to share a simple message through their music : stop to go on headache, come laugh with us!

Line up:
Thin Max - Voice / Guitar
ClÃƒÂ©ment - Drums
Hubert - Bass Guitar
Dimitri - Lead Guitar

Format : MP3 (320 Kbs)
